mapper.select: SELECT pro_serialnumber as 'serialNumber', SUM(pro_paycount) as 'payCount' FROM product where pro_paycount > 0 group by pro_serialnumber order by SUM(pro_paycount) desc limit 0, 5
select pro_serialnumber as 'serialNumber', pro_bucketcount as 'bucketCount' from product where pro_bucketcount > 0 order by pro_bucketcount desc limit 0, 5

SELECT CASE DAYOFWEEK(SuccessTime) WHEN 2 THEN '월요일' WHEN 3 THEN '화요일' WHEN 4 THEN '수요일' WHEN 5 THEN '목요일' WHEN 6 THEN '금요일' WHEN 7 THEN '토요일' WHEN 1 THEN '일요일' ELSE '유효한 날짜가 아닙니다.' END as week, Amount as sales from payment where Success = '결제 완료' and SuccessTime like concat('2023', '%') group by orderid order by DAYOFWEEK(SuccessTime)

select member.gender as gender, orderProduct.count as 'productCount', product.pro_categoryserial as 'categorySerial', member.age as 'age' from orderProduct inner join moodorder on moodorder.orderid = orderProduct.orderid inner join moodjoin as member on moodorder.userno = member.no inner join product on product.pro_number = orderProduct.pro_number inner join payment on payment.orderid = orderProduct.orderid where payment.Success = '결제 완료' and payment.SuccessTime like concat(#{year}, '%') order by member.age desc limit 0, 5

select moodorder.orderid as 'orderNo', moodorder.address as 'address', member.name as 'name', member.phone as 'phone', moodorder.price as 'amount', payment.SuccessTime as 'payDate' from moodorder inner join moodjoin as member on member.no = moodorder.userNo inner join payment on payment.orderid = moodorder.orderid where payment.Success = '결제 완료' group by orderNo order by orderNo desc
limit #{startNo}, #{endNo}

select moodorder.orderid as 'orderNo', moodorder.address as 'address', member.name as 'name', member.phone as 'phone', moodorder.price as 'amount', payment.SuccessTime as 'payDate' from moodorder inner join moodjoin as member on member.no = moodorder.userNo inner join payment on payment.orderid = moodorder.orderid where payment.Success = '결제 완료'
and member.name like concat('%', #{searchName}, '%')
and moodorder.orderid = #{orderNo}
and member.phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
and payment.SuccessTime like concat('%', #{date}, '%')
group by orderNo order by orderNo desc
limit #{startNo}, #{endNo}

select orderProduct.orderid as'orderNo', (orderProduct.price/orderProduct.count) as 'price', orderProduct.count as 'productCount', product.pro_serialnumber as 'productNo', product.pro_name as 'productName' from orderProduct inner join product on product.pro_number = orderProduct.pro_number order by orderNo desc
